title: Bowl of red water

properties.name: description
properties.value: A bowl of red water is an item obtained within the minigame Trouble Brewing. It is made by using a bowl on the kettle with red flowers in it. It is an ingredient to make rum and can be put in the hopper. It is also used on a monkey to make the monkey into a Red monkey who can collect a bitternut.

A bowl of red water is an item obtained within the minigame Trouble Brewing. It is made by using a bowl on the kettle with red flowers in it. It is an ingredient to make rum and can be put in the hopper. It is also used on a monkey to make the monkey into a Red monkey who can collect a bitternut.

Products[edit | edit source]

ItemMembersSkillsXPMaterials
Red monkey
  • None
  • None
  • 1 × Monkey (Trouble Brewing)
  • 1 × Bowl of red water

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Using the bowl of red water on a monkey from Trouble Brewing outside of Trouble Brewing results in the message Where did you get that water from? appearing in the chatbox.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

Trouble Brewing items were made unbankable.

[[File:Bowl of red water detail.png|left|130px]]
A '''bowl of red water''' is an item obtained within the [[minigame]] [[Trouble Brewing]]. It is made by using a [[bowl]] on the kettle with [[Red flowers (Trouble Brewing)|red flowers]] in it. It is an ingredient to make [[rum (Trouble Brewing)|rum]] and can be put in the hopper. It is also used on a [[Monkey (Trouble Brewing)|monkey]] to make the monkey into a [[Red monkey]] who can collect a [[bitternut]].

==Products==
{{Uses material list|Bowl of red water}}

==Trivia==
* Using the bowl of red water on a [[Monkey (Trouble Brewing)|monkey from Trouble Brewing]] outside of Trouble Brewing results in the message {{RSFont|Where did you get that water from?}} appearing in the chatbox.
